ValidationRule.description: Validation to not able to edit total amount on invoice line item after invoice is accepted or sent to client
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Invoice__r.Stage__c ,'Sent to Client'), ISPICKVAL(Invoice__r.Stage__c ,'Accepted') ),
ISCHANGED(Total_Amount__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Total Amount can't be updated since Invoice has reached to "Sent to Client" or "Accepted" stage.
